General.Name: Union Auction Public Company Limited
General.Description: Union Auction Public Company Limited provides auction services for assets in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Vehicle Auction, Motorcycle Auction, Transportation, and Other Services. It is involved in the auction of property, automobiles, motorcycles, 5G spectrums, phone numbers, obsolete office equipment, brand-name products, singer electrical appliances, real estate, land and houses, shares, and furniture, as well as a golfer's precious thing. The company also offers vehicle transfer and price estimate services; AUCT Live, which supports online auction by displaying live video and audio from the auction site in real time; and AUCT BID, a system to support the auction of various products, such as vehicle, motorcycle, real estate, brand name products, etc. It operates auction venues, as well as provides mobile auction services. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
